description.@en: I’ve always had a way with words, an ability to comfort others in their darkest moments.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Whenever you fail a Charm or Stealth Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result, but must accept the outcome. In addition, whenever you hide in urban environments during a Combat Encounter, it only costs 1 AP.
